common_0300_man_a_01: Toma ya! It’s time for the great outdoors!
common_0300_woman_a_01: Come on, Cyclizar! We’re riding out!
common_0300_head_teacher_01:
Take care, everyone! And remember—the Great
Crater of Paldea is exceedingly dangerous!\r
Entering it is a violation of school rules![npcn:A]
common_0300_head_teacher_02:
Hmm. Do you think everyone heard my warning?\c
With the students so full of vim and vigor, I find it
hard not to worry.[npcn:A]
common_0300_man_b_01:
When you’re told you can do anything at all,
it sort of makes it harder to know where to start...
common_0300_man_c_01:
The Treasure Hunt—I’ve been waiting for this!\c
I’m gonna take the best photos ever with the
new camera I spent all my pocket money on!
common_0300_man_d_01:
To me, treasure hunting means catching Pokémon!
I’m going to fill up my Pokédex for sure!
common_0300_woman_b_01:
Where should I go? I wish someone else would
just decide for me...
common_0300_woman_c_01:
I’m gonna take my Pokémon picnicking in all the
best spots around the region!
